channel.title: How do you...add
channel.description: how do you add yell on delta scape's source, What do i search up? what should i put in?

item.title: How do you...add
item.dc:creator: @FireClan FireClan
item.description:
@FireClan wrote:

[quote=“Jordiescape, post:10, topic:261902”][quote author=jc22493 link=topic=345884.msg2666149#msg2666149 date=1234569541]

Add this with you’re other commands

For Delta

wtf guys!

[quote] if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 8) {
String text = command.substring(4);
yell(""+playerName+" yells: " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
}[/quote]

[/quote][quote author=Jordiescape link=topic=345884.msg2666002#msg2666002 date=1234560143]

if (command.startsWith("yell")) { msg = command.substring(5); yell(playerName+": "+msg); }
[/quote][quote author=Darkning link=topic=345884.msg2666027#msg2666027 date=1234561851]

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5) { String text = command.substring(5); yell("["+playerName+"] - " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }

Why the hell would you spoonfeed him?
[/quote]
Cause he’s obviously incapable himself.[/quote]

Read full topic
